video.description:
Last November I followed Crudo Volta Radio around 5 towns of Morocco looking for the most authentic Soul, Jazz, Rock and Folk. The following trailer is a recap of our trip through the wild streets of Maghreb and a preview of the mixtape named Petit Taxi.
FOLLOW CRUDO VOLTA RADIO ON:
FACEBOOK facebook.com/crudovoltaradio
TWITTER: twitter.com/crudovoltaradio 
SOUNDCLOUD: soundcloud.com/crudovoltaradio
INSTAGRAM: instagram.com/crudovoltaradio
Mixtape out soon.
